General.Name: Kovrovskiy Mekhanicheskiy
General.Description: Kovrov Mechanical Plant, Public Joint-Stock Company manufactures and sells gas centrifuges for the nuclear industry in Russia. The company produces gas centrifuges used for the separation of uranium isotopes. It also provides water supply services. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Kovrov, Russia.
